page.title: 10CARRIAGE MAKER
page.content: {Rod Salter}has been working since 1970_1985 which is 15 years. He has 1 and a half acres and a quarter off it is grassland and the rest is building. He does blacksmithing aswell.He still makes full carriages and mends them.He has 1 horse,4 kittens,3 dogs,12 pigeons,1 duck and drake and 2 cats.They also have a pond.The carriages are made out of wood and metal and then painted.He has made 300 of 1 sort and 40 of another sort and about a dozen of different sorts and he sends them to different countries. He also won the horse of the year show with one of his own carriages that he made.They've made 8 different kinds of carriages.They train septer the horse.He uses ash,elm,oak woods.They import woods aswell they are: mahogany,hickery.He has 7 machines.He is a very nice person.
